language.name: hl7terser
language.title: HL7 Terser
language.description: Get the value of a HL7 message field specified by terse location specification syntax.
language.label: language,hl7

id.description: Sets the id of this node

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

variableName.description: Name of variable to use as input, instead of the message body

headerName.label: advanced
headerName.description: Name of header to use as input, instead of the message body

propertyName.label: advanced
propertyName.description: Name of property to use as input, instead of the message body.

resultType.description: Sets the class of the result type (type from output)

trim.label: advanced
trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks
